message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering its significant value to you at $10,000. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. While I see the value of the product, I'm only able to offer $10,500 at this time. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget.  Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $11,000 for the product? This is still above its intrinsic value to you, but it allows us to close the deal. Let me know if this proposal works for you.
